channel.title: Java on IgE Time
channel.description: Recent content in Java on IgE Time

item.title: ReDrUm Java
item.description: One of my favorite horror movies of all time is Stanley Kubrick’s “The Shining”. It has minimum deaths and killing but still conveys the same kind of fear and anticipation every horror movie has. So, after finding myself absolutely bored in the middle of November 2019, I gave the movie a spin again. It was the scene when Wendy finds out that Jack had abandoned his play to write the sentence “All work no play makes Jack a dull boy” in different variations that had inspired me to write up some code. Something about the variation was particularly spooky, and I wanted to copy it.

item.title: this new site
item.description:
IT’S been a type of thing I’ve been thinking about for a while- a website for all my thoughts. A place for essays on anything, “research papers”, and ideas written in my own voice and writing style/format.

So, it begins- eversley.space. A new era of my life where I shall be documenting my ideas and thoughts. My project process and words, words, words and words.

ONE may ask why the painting “I Love the Whole World” by Agnes Martin is on the home page. Perhaps I’m feeling a bit “cultured” some may say… but it’s just something about Agnes Martin that makes one feel a bit more.
